attributes.action: Abolish Emergency Tax for Tax Discussion.
attributes.additional_details: ANYONE TAKING MONEY WITHOUT DICUSSION OR WARNING...CLASSED AS CRIMINAL OFFENCE INCLUDING GOV TAX OFFICIALS
attributes.background: Make it illegal for Gov Bodies, Tax Office, to take Emergency Tax from British People and instead bring in Discussed Tax, wherein it is discussed between the Payee and Official Body to discuss the matter.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the tax system to be changed.
